pages.title: Pastel Network
pages.text: Your primitive ways of item transport like hopper arrays do not compare to the Pastel Network - that is what you called clusters of Azurite-based nodes. Placed in close proximity, nodes will connect wirelessly to one another and form an item transfer network.$(br)Nodes do not require line of sight.

pages.text: The way nodes will interact with one another.
